name: Pelago
headline: The world's first digital clinic for substance use management
description: Pelago, formerly Quit Genius, is the world’s leading virtual clinic for substance use management. We are transforming substance use support—from prevention to treatment—delivering education, management skills, and opportunities for positive change to members struggling with substance use, most commonly tobacco, alcohol, or opioids. Our solution gives employers the means to offer on-demand, personalized support to workers seeking to live healthier lives. Pelago’s cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and medication-assisted treatment (MAT) programs deliver convenient, accessible, and effective support that seamlessly integrates with health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, and wellness platforms. To date, Pelago has helped more than 750,000 members manage their substance use and improve their lives.

founders.name: Yusuf Sherwani, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Pelago. Medical Doctor.

# Substance use care that works
Pelago’s virtual clinic offers personalized substance use care for members wanting to cut back, stop or otherwise manage their tobacco, alcohol, opioid and cannabis use.
[Get started](https://www.pelagohealth.com/<https:/www.pelagohealth.com/get-started/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F10%2FHome-Hero-webp.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F10%2FHome-hero-2-webp.webp&w=3840&q=75)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F10%2FHome-Hero-3-webp.webp&w=3840&q=75)
## Trusted by hundreds of organizations
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
[![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)For employersReduce your healthcare spend, boost workforce productivity, and help your employees live healthier lives.](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</how-it-works/for-employers/>)[![Health icon](https://www.pelagohealth.com)For health plansEmpower your members with an industry-leading, clinically-proven program backed by decades of research.](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</how-it-works/for-health-plans/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
###### Substance Use Management
## A sea of support
Substance use management is a personalized approach to managing substance use based on individual health, habits, genetics, and goals. Cost-effective, accessible, and without all the stigma, our approach goes far beyond traditional treatment programs to give people everything they need to move forward.
### Alcohol
Pelago members see a 62% reduction in alcohol use within the first 30 days of care.
[Learn more](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</what-we-treat/alcohol/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F02%2FAlcohol.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Tobacco
44% of members quit tobacco use in just 12 months.
[Learn more](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</what-we-treat/tobacco/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F02%2FTobacco.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Opioids
67% of Pelago members are opioid abstinent for a full 90 days.
[Learn more](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</what-we-treat/opioids/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F02%2FOpiod.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
### Cannabis
40% of all adult SUDs stem from cannabis use, and 60% of all adolescent SUDs.
[Learn more](https://www.pelagohealth.com/<https:/www.pelagohealth.com/our-approach/cannabis/>)
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fpelagocms.wpengine.com%2Fwp-content%2Fuploads%2F2023%2F03%2FOpioid-Hero.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
## Happy employees, thriving organization
The impact of substance use on employer healthcare costs is real. Let us help you deliver life-changing outcomes that are kind to your people, as well as your bottom line.
[Calculate savings](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</cost-analysis/>)
### 10%
or less of those suffering from a substance use disorder ever receive treatment
### $15k
is spent in annual healthcare expenditure per affected employee
### $9.3k
per participant healthcare cost saving in the first year
## One program, all the help members need
Pelago’s virtual clinic empowers members via a range of personalized, evidence-based solutions.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### Physician-led care team
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27664%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![Counseling](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
Unlimited access to an expert team of physicians, nurses, coaches, and counselors.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### Complex condition management 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27664%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
Help for members with co-occurring mental illness, and other chronic conditions like diabetes or heart disease.
![Care icon](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### Centers of Excellence
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27665%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
Members have access to high-quality, clinically vetted inpatient treatment facilities, including RCA and Banyan. We coordinate their care and transition them back to Pelago after discharge.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### Personalized tech and support
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27664%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![Pelago app CBT](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
Round-the-clock virtual support such as cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT), tracking, and other helpful content.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### Remote monitoring
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27664%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
At-home devices used to monitor program outcomes and motivate members — breathalyzers, urinary test kits, and more.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
### PelagoRX
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27664%27%20height=%27936%27/%3e)![Pelago app medication management](https://www.pelagohealth.com)
A members’ hub for medication-assisted treatment (MAT), offering confidential prescriptions and a straightforward integration with pharmacy partners.
## Propelling people forward with substance use care that works.
![](https://www.pelagohealth.com)

## Real research, life-changing outcomes
Clinical research is at the heart of everything we do. We’ve worked hard to understand the best treatment plans, delivering industry-leading outcomes for your people.
[Our clinical approach](https://www.pelagohealth.com/</resources/research/>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pelago**

**Name:** Pelago (formerly Quit Genius)  
**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Team Size:** 180 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator W18  

**Mission:** Pelago aims to be the world’s first digital clinic dedicated to managing substance use disorders (SUD) by providing comprehensive support for prevention, treatment, and recovery.

Pelago began its journey as a groundbreaking virtual clinic designed to tackle substance use management. It has positioned itself at the forefront of a much-needed health initiative, supporting individuals struggling with addictions to tobacco, alcohol, opioids, and cannabis. Their approach encompasses personalized interventions which blend cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and medication-assisted treatment (MAT). This helps members develop the skills and knowledge necessary to navigate their journey towards healthier living.

**Key Features & Offerings:**
- **Personalized Care:** Each member of Pelago receives customized treatment plans based on their health profile and goals.
- **Integrated Solutions:** Pelago seamlessly collaborates with health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, and wellness programs, making care accessible anytime and anywhere.
- **Proven Outcomes:** The clinic has successfully assisted over 750,000 individuals, achieving significant reductions in substance use. For example, members report a 62% decrease in alcohol use within the first 30 days and a 67% abstinence rate from opioids after 90 days.
- **Remote Support:** With a team composed of physicians, nurses, coaches, and counselors, Pelago provides round-the-clock support through its virtual platform. They also use innovative tools for ongoing monitoring, like breathalyzers and urine test kits, to help motivate members.

**Benefit for Employers:**
Pelago empowers businesses to enhance employee wellness and productivity while reducing healthcare costs associated with substance use disorders. By offering this vital service, employers not only support their workforce but also contribute to a healthier organizational environment.

**Current Focus:**
- Introducing new product enhancements and updates as part of their Winter 2025 Release.
- Enhancing their resource library to provide even greater support for users.

Whether you’re an employer looking to improve workplace health or an individual seeking help, Pelago presents a digital solution that bridges the gap in substance use management, providing effective, stigma-free support. 

For more information, visit their website: [Pelago Health](https://www.pelagohealth.com).
